name: Roasted Holiday Veggies
description: We’re spilling the secret to slashing your roasting time by pre-cooking some of the veggies in the microwave. It’s a game-changer for busy hosts! Infused with the cozy notes of sage and rosemary, these veggies will make a splendid addition to your next festivity.
preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Peel and chop carrots. Place in Multipurpose Steamer with squash. Cover and microwave on high for 5 min or until slightly softened.

Peel and slice onion. Cut Brussels sprouts into halves or quarters. In large bowl, combine steamed carrots and squash, onion, Brussels sprouts, seasoning, oil, and salt, if using. Arrange in a single layer on pan.
Bake 25 min or until veggies are golden and tender.
tips: Substitute one carrot with a parsnip for even more variety!
